message: I'm excited to offer you this product! With over 10% of my products sold being high-quality, I'm confident that this one has a good chance of being a great value. It's a one-time offer at $100, and I'm willing to vouch for its quality. What do you think?

Since no products have been sold yet, there's no sales record to base my decision on. Additionally, your claim of over 10% high-quality products sold is misleading since there are no sales. Given the 80% chance of a high-quality product and its $200 value to me, I would expect a more substantial guarantee or a lower price. I'll pass on this offer.
